FEATURES:
Age of Wonders III - the long-awaited continuation of the award-winning series of strategy games. It combines construction, war and role-playing component. Age of Wonders III - the best turn-based strategy in a fantasy world for experienced players and beginners.
Features RePacka:
The basis is taken from RELOADED release

Installation requires 1 GB of RAM
